mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_blocks ( "height" , "curBlock" , "prevBlock" , "merkleRoot" , "timestamp" ) VALUES ( ${height} , #{curBlock} , #{prevBlock} , #{merkleRoot} , ${timestamp} ) ON CONFLICT ("height") DO NOTHING;
